sentences.sContent: The lighted dial of her watch said 1.20.
sentences.sCn: 她手表上的夜光表面显示时间为1点20分。

sentences.sContent: She looked at the dial to check her speed.
sentences.sCn: 她看了看仪表盘，以确认自己的速度。

phrases.pCn: 转盘电话机；自动电话（等于dial phone）
表盘；标示板；指针板；拨号盘
英制千分表；度盘式指示器；刻度盘

trans.tranOther: the round part of a clock, watch, machine etc that has numbers that show you the time or a measurement
to press the buttons or turn the dial on a telephone in order to make a telephone call
